abcSeq
abc
----
{
  "type": "SeqTrace",
  "itemTraces": [
    {
      "type": "TextTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 0,
        "to": 1
      },
      "error": null
    },
    {
      "type": "TextTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 1,
        "to": 2
      },
      "error": null
    },
    {
      "type": "TextTrace",
      "span": {
        "from": 2,
        "to": 3
      },
      "error": null
    }
  ],
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 3
  },
  "error": null
}

abcChoice
a
----
{
  "type": "ChoiceTrace",
  "error": null,
  "innerTrace": {
    "type": "TextTrace",
    "span": {
      "from": 0,
      "to": 1
    },
    "error": null
  },
  "optIdx": 0,
  "span": {
    "from": 0,
    "to": 1
  }
}
